alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 28 at 5:54AM ChST until March 02 at 7:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...STRONG DAYTIME WINDS AND DRY CONDITIONS MAY LEAD TO RAPID FIRE SPREAD ACROSS PARTS OF GUAM... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect through Wednesday evening. * WIND...Sustained 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 30 mph during the afternoons through Wednesday * HUMIDITY...As low as 55 to 60 percent in the afternoons. * HIGHEST THREAT...Southern part of Guam, mainly along and south of Cross Island Road. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Very little rainfall is expected for the next few day, and will allow for drier conditions to develop. Fuel stick readings are around 12.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
